race.name: Half-Elf, Dragonmark of Detection
Half-Elf, Dragonmark of Detection

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: One other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

trait.name: Deductive Intuition
trait.text: When you make an Intelligence (Investigation) or a Wisdom (Insight) check, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check

trait.name: Magical Detection
trait.text: You can cast the detect magic and detect poison and disease spells with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the see invisibility spell with it. Once you cast any of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells, and you don't require material components for them.

race.spells: Detect Magic, Detect Poison and Disease, See Invisibility, Detect Evil and Good, Detect Poison and Disease, Detect Thoughts, Find Traps, Clairvoyance, Nondetection, Arcane Eye, Divination, Legend Lore

trait.name: Spells of the Mark
trait.text: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Detection Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.
Spell Level Spells
1st detect evil and good, detect poison and disease
2nd detect thoughts.find traps
3rd clairvoyance, nondetection
4th arcane eye, divination
5th legend lore

trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.
